My Cannabis Rx

The MyCannabisRx mobile app allows you to track your medical cannabis use and share results with your doctor.

Download Now!

The MyCannabisRx mobile app is the first step in creating your Electronic Cannabis Health Record. Document, track, and trend your medical cannabis usage to better understand how the medicine works best for you. Then, send that information to your cannabis physician with only a few touches on your iPhone screen.

Highlights

Giovanni Peña

Chief Executive Officer

Hi! My name is Giovanni. I have spent the last 10 years working with electronic health record systems in various outpatient, hospital, and business settings. My professional experience combined with the passion to help people and solve problems, have brought me to you today. With the help of a rockstar team, we’ve created MyCannabisRx, the first step in creating your Electronic Cannabis Health Record.

Senior health IT professional with a clinical background. A results-oriented individual specializing in creative solutions, improving end-user experience, and optimizing workflows. I view challenges as an opportunity to showcase my soft skills by listening objectively, communicating effectively, and working collaboratively.

Project 1

This is the dashboard of MyCannabisRx iOS application. Using `+` button from bottom-right corner, one can add a session. By changing month from calendar, user can view past cannabis session. By tapping buttons from bottom-corner, one can switch to calendar view, List of sessions view or reports view.

Project 2

This is the dashboard of MyCannabisRx iOS application. By tapping on reports button from bottom-center, one can view different types of reports. For example, here we've hightlighted strains report. There are many more types of reports. To view them, tap on report name from top-horizontal-scrollable-list.

Project 3

From this screen, one can explore strains, see news from different cannabis news providers, explore state level cannabis information, dispensaries. One can also update his/her profile and medical conditions. It is very easy to connect with your 1upHealth as well.
